comments.body: Does `kERROR` in TensorRT land mean a fatal error? Can a program still continue with a `kERROR`? You may want to use `LOG(FATAL)` if errors are fatal.

I think it will probably be better to issue the fatal outside tensorrt stack, back in the tensorflow domain. This logger is called from within TensorRT library. The api call will return a failure when error happens and then we will create a FATAL log with more information about the context.
